## Pipeline Status

This dashboard displays the latest results from the clinical pipeline execution.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(DT)
library(dplyr)

# Display recent workflow runs
status_df <- data.frame(
  Run = c("Latest", "Previous"),
  Status = c("Success", "Success"),
  Date = c(Sys.Date(), Sys.Date() - 1),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

datatable(status_df, 
          options = list(pageLength = 10, dom = 't'),
          rownames = FALSE)
```

## QC Reports

Quality control validation results are available in the workflow artifacts.

## Generated Outputs

TLF (Tables, Listings, Figures) outputs are generated automatically with each pipeline run.
